description: This file defines a React functional component `Header` that renders the application's header bar with branding, navigation buttons, and action buttons including favorites and sign-out, utilizing context and navigation functions.

methods.name: Header({ onOpenFavorites, onNavigateHome, children })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the app header with navigation and action buttons.

methods.name: goHome
methods.description: Handles navigation to the home route, calling onNavigateHome prop if provided or defaulting to '/home'.

methods.name: openFav
methods.description: Handles opening the favorites view, calling onOpenFavorites prop if provided or defaulting to '/favorites'.

methods.name: onSignOut
methods.description: Signs out the user via signOut from context and navigates to the sign-in page.

ctags.name: Header
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Header({ onOpenFavorites, onNavigateHome, children }) {$/
